description:
goprotobuf: fix compilation error

Switched the initialization of the printer to use named arguments
as an attempt at future-proofing.

messages.text:
Hello dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/

https://codereview.appspot.com/6947079/diff/2001/protoc-gen-go/generator/generator.go
File protoc-gen-go/generator/generator.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6947079/diff/2001/protoc-gen-go/generator/generator.go#newcode932
protoc-gen-go/generator/generator.go:932: err = (&printer.Config{Mode: printer.TabIndent | printer.UseSpaces}).Fprint(g, fset, ast)
why remove the tabstop setting?

subject: code review 6947079: goprotobuf: fix compilation error
